page.title: 09LIFE AT HOME
page.content: Life at home is rather simple until you start cleaning.The real problem as you get older life gets harder. As time passes more economical things are invented,hoovers for instance they are alot better to use than brushes, because you can do hoovering quicker. Irons: they dont have to be heated by the fire like the olden days.Things today are making life easy for us all. TV is also clever because they can get news all round the world,some people say they would rather give up talking to their parents.When you are young you really just play.When you are old enough to get a job and make money some people think themselves to be lazy and they throw money around like candy floss.Some companys give their business men cars to use,whereas others dont.House wives stay at home and clean the house up.
